lead_paragraph: Even underpowered grocery-getters would gain safety and weight advantages with advanced brakes — but they probably won’t get them anytime soon.
snippet: Even underpowered grocery-getters would gain safety and weight advantages with advanced brakes — but they probably won’t get them anytime soon.

headline.main: Superbrakes for Civilians? The Cost Is the Obstacle
headline.print_headline: Superbrakes for Civilians? The Cost Is the Obstacle
